## normal44 variable

Converts given 4x4 matrix to a 4x4 matrix normal matrix, i.e. the transposed inverse. Writes results to `m` if `out` is null. Returns `undefined` if matrix inversion failed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
normal44: MatOpMU
```
